description:
While we’ve often pondered what a Vampire Diaries/Teen Wolf crossover would look like, we’ll just have to settle for this awesome news: Both TVD’s Nina Dobrev and TW’s Tyler Posey have been selected by Variety.我们经常会想，如果《吸血鬼日记》和《少狼》有交集会是怎样的画面呢？我们刚刚得到一个消息：《吸血鬼日记》的Nina Dobrev和《少狼》的Tyler Posey双双被《Variety》杂志选为他们7月月刊杂志封面人物。

Nina’s being honored for her work with Free the Children, while Tyler is getting accolades for his work with the Leukemia and Lymphoma Society. People who have been affected by the stars’ involvement in these charities will also attend the event.Nina的入选理由是她的自由儿童计划，而Tyler的入选理由则是他在白血病淋巴瘤协会的工作广受好评。受到偶像影响参与这些慈善活动的粉丝们也会参与到《Variety》举行的盛宴活动中。

Congratulations to Nina, Tyler, Abigail, and Jake!恭喜Nina、Tyler、Abigail和Jake！

title: 《吸血鬼日记》女主再登杂志封面
